requirements.name: PR1.1
requirements.description: A service portfolio shall be maintained. All services shall be specified as part of the service portfolio.

requirements.name: PR1.2
requirements.description: Design and transition of new or changed services shall be planned.

requirements.name: PR1.3
requirements.description: Plans for the design and transition of new or changed services shall consider timescales, responsibilities, new or changed technology, communication and service acceptance criteria.

requirements.name: PR1.4
requirements.description: The organisational structure supporting the delivery of services shall be identified, including a potential federation structure as well as contact points for all parties involved.

requirements.name: PR2.1
requirements.description: A service catalogue shall be maintained.

requirements.name: PR2.2
requirements.description: For all services delivered to customers, SLAs shall be in place.

requirements.name: PR2.3
requirements.description: SLAs shall be reviewed at planned intervals.

requirements.name: PR2.4
requirements.description: Service performance shall be evaluated against service targets defined in SLAs.

requirements.name: PR2.5
requirements.description: For supporting services or service components provided by federation members or groups belonging to the same organisation as the service provider or external suppliers, OLAs and UAs shall be agreed.

requirements.name: PR2.6
requirements.description: OLAs and UAs shall be reviewed at planned intervals.

requirements.name: PR2.7
requirements.description: Performance of service components shall be evaluated against operational targets defined in OLAs and UAs.

requirements.name: PR3.1
requirements.description: Service reports shall be specified and agreed with their recipients.

requirements.name: PR3.2
requirements.description: The specification of each service report shall include its identity, purpose, audience, frequency, content, format and method of delivery.

requirements.name: PR3.2
requirements.description: Service reports shall be produced. Service reporting shall include performance against agreed targets, information about significant events and detected nonconformities.

requirements.name: PR4.1
requirements.description: Service availability and continuity requirements shall be identified taking into consideration SLAs.

requirements.name: PR4.2
requirements.description: Service availability and continuity plans shall be created and maintained.

requirements.name: PR4.3
requirements.description: Service availability and continuity planning shall consider measures to reduce the probability and impact of identified availability and continuity risks

requirements.name: PR4.4
requirements.description: Availability of services and service components shall be monitored.

requirements.name: PR5.1
requirements.description: Service capacity and performance requirements shall be identified taking into consideration SLAs.

requirements.name: PR5.2
requirements.description: Capacity plans shall be created and maintained.

requirements.name: PR5.3
requirements.description: Capacity planning shall consider human, technical and financial resources.

requirements.name: PR5.4
requirements.description: Performance of services and service components shall be monitored based on monitoring the degree of capacity utilisation and identifying operational warnings and exceptions.

requirements.name: PR6.1
requirements.description: Information security policies shall be defined.

requirements.name: PR6.2
requirements.description: Physical, technical and organizational information security controls shall be implemented to reduce the probability and impact of identified information  risks.

requirements.name: PR6.3
requirements.description: Information security policies and controls shall be reviewed at planned intervals.

requirements.name: PR6.4
requirements.description: Information security events and incidents shall be given an appropriate priority and managed accordingly.

requirements.name: PR6.5
requirements.description: Access control, including provisioning of access rights, for information-processing systems and services shall be carried out in a consistent manner.

requirements.name: PR7.1
requirements.description: Service customers shall be identified.

requirements.name: PR7.2
requirements.description: For each customer, there shall be a designated contact responsible for managing the customer relationship and customer satisfaction.

requirements.name: PR7.3
requirements.description: Communication mechanisms with customers shall be established.

requirements.name: PR7.4
requirements.description: Service reviews with the customers shall be conducted at planned intervals.

requirements.name: PR7.5
requirements.description: Service complaints from customers shall be managed.

requirements.name: PR7.6
requirements.description: Customer satisfaction shall be managed.

requirements.name: PR8.1
requirements.description: Suppliers shall be identified.

requirements.name: PR8.2
requirements.description: For each supplier, there shall be a designated contact responsible for managing the relationship with the supplier.
Communication mechanisms with suppliers shall be established.

requirements.name: PR8.4
requirements.description: Supplier performance shall be monitored.

requirements.name: PR9.1
requirements.description: All incidents and service requests shall be registered, classified and prioritized in a consistent manner.

requirements.name: PR9.2
requirements.description: Prioritization of incidents and service requests shall take into account service targets from SLAs

requirements.name: PR9.3
requirements.description: Escalation of incidents and service requests shall be carried out in a consistent manner.

requirements.name: PR9.4
requirements.description: Closure of incidents and service requests shall be carried out in a consistent manner.

requirements.name: PR9.5
requirements.description: Personnel involved in the incident and service request management process shall have access to relevant information including known errors, workarounds, configuration and release information.

requirements.name: PR9.6
requirements.description: Users shall be kept informed of the progress of incidents and service requests they have reported.

requirements.name: PR9.7
requirements.description: There shall be a definition of major incidents and a consistent approach to managing them.
